casebody.data:
Argued January 31, STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. STEVEN HAROLD LYONS (No. 78749), Appellant. 505 P2d 351 John W. Osburn, Solicitor General, Salem, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief was Lee Johnson, Attorney General, Salem.

affirmed January 31, 1973

Niholaus Albrecht, Portland, argued the cause and filed the brief for appellant.

Before Schwab, Chief Judge, and Foley and Thornton, Judges.
